content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to live information or data. However, the Canadian Football League (CFL) usually begins its season in June and plays regular-season games until November. The playoff games are held in November, culminating in the Grey Cup championship in late November. However, due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the CFL did not hold any games in 2020. The league has not yet announced the official start date for the 2021 season, but it is expected to start in June or July, pending approval from public health authorities.
